{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\Q\\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q The example differential equation we wish to solve is the simple derivative in eq:derivative.\\E$"}
{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QThe complex formulation of the Fourier series is presented in eq:fourier_series.\\E$"}
